org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins

Class DatasetsItemsSelectorOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.NativeObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins.DatasetsItemsSelectorOptions

  • public final class DatasetsItemsSelectorOptions
extends NativeObjectContainer
    Configuration options of selection plugin.
    It is managing:
    • the X axis ID
    • the selection color
    • the border color
    • the border width
    • the border dash
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DatasetsItemsSelectorOptions()
      Builds the object with a new java script object setting the default value of plugin.

      • setXAxisID

        public void setXAxisID(java.lang.String xAxisID)
        Sets the ID of the x axis to plot this dataset on. If not specified, this defaults to the ID of the first found x axis.
        Parameters:
        xAxisID - the ID of the x axis to plot this dataset on. If not specified, this defaults to the ID of the first found x axis.
